Html:
Hi,

I haven't used Rawr for a while.  I remember there was an option to lock the item enchants and gems by putting a red dot on them, but I can't remember how.

I read the documentation and watched the tour video.  This page (http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=GearOptimization) mentions the red dot, but doesn't actually say how to put the red dot on. =(  The video doesn't say it at all.  Someone tell me please?  I'm so frustrated.  All I manage to do is blue diamonds.

The "Red Dot" functionality has been replaced with Blue Diamond. 

Green Diamond means that an item is available.

Blue Diamond means that an item is locked w/ that set of reforge/gem/enchant.
You used to be able to use red dot and/or blue diamond and they were different.   But I don't remember the details.   I think one required a right click and the other was a shift click or something.
When we had red dots the blue diamond only locked the gems, now blue diamond locks everything.
